transcript:
Customer: Hello, ek minute ruko.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan bolo, hello.
Customer: Haan ji madam, meri very good afternoon, Divanshi ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan haan kaun?
Executive: Divanshi ji main Manisha baat kar rahi hoon, India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon madam.
Customer: Haan haan are ha madam abhi hai na mere ko ek solution do, idhar jo India Mart ka jo Rajkot ka jo service person hai na mera.
Customer: Partner hai.
Customer: Haan to uska mere ko number do na mere ko direct meeting arrange karao, physical meeting arrange karao mere office pe bulao.
Executive: Achcha, madam main bata deti hoon main na head office se baat kar rahi hoon theek hai Noida branch se.
Executive: To aapka jo catalog hai na aapne wahin se liya hoga Rajkot ka, Rajkot ke sales person se unse right, lekin aapka na abhi hamare paas jo hai Noida head branch mein aapka catalog transfer ho gaya hai theek hai, to jo bhi discussion hoga aapka wo mere sath hi hoga madam service se related, jo bhi aapko discussion karna hai aap wo mere sath kar sakte hain.
Customer: Are mere ko package ke liye milna hai, mere ko physical meeting chahiye mere ko idhar office pe.
Executive: Madam ek cheez bataiye agar main call pe aur video meet pe aapko sari cheeze dikha do package upgrade se related bhi.
Customer: Achcha ek kaam kijiye ha okay main samajh gayi okay to mere ko 6 baje call kijiye chaliye I will be waiting right now I am in meeting.
Executive: Theek hai main aapka ek email id pe na meeting schedule kar deti hoon madam.
Customer: Haan 6 baje ka meeting schedule kar dijiye okay thank you.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Okay thank you.
Customer: Are yaar.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to arrange a physical meeting.

- Wants the Rajkot service person's number.



Resolution:

- Executive informed catalog transferred to Noida head branch.

- Agreed to a meeting at 6:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting will be scheduled on customer's email ID.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- physical meeting, catalog, service, meeting schedule
